text:
Kemarin saya nginap bersama keluarga, Langsung to the point aj ya
Minus:
1. Seprei/selimut kotor dan bau apek
2. AC berisik banget putaran Fan ny
3. Pintu kamar mandi berdecit banget engselny
4. Bantal sofa bener2 bau, heran bisa2ny di berikan ke tamu
5. Info breakfast katany minimal 6 taun free, tapi anak saya 5 taun di charge 40k
6. Kamar tidak kedap suara, jadi suara tutup pintu kamar lain atau obrolan di lorong terdengar jelas banget.
7. Minta ganti sprei dr awal check in, sampai malam pun blom diganti.
8. Telp kamar rusak..

Satu2ny postif hanya lokasi yg strategis bgt..
Saya harap maintenance hotel di tingkatkan lg, terutama kamar..Karena kita bayar bukan menumpang gratis.

FYI saya nginap dikamar 318 dan 320

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Saya menginap di kala pandemi, yang mungkin pasti ada sesuatu yang dikurangi menjadi lebih hemat. Dan biasanya saya senang saja nginap di properti Kagum, namun kali ini bisa di bilang tidak kagum (mungkin efek penghematan).

Yang saya kagumi dari Serela adalah lokasi yang super strategis, di tengah Cihampelas, dan dekat dengan Ciwalk serta keramaian (kalau akhir pekan mungkin akan macet), protokol kesehatan diterapkan dengan baik serta staff yang ramah dan baik (terutama Pak Gugum/Gumelar security di depan saya lupa namanya), selebihnya tidak. 
Dan yang pasti saya dapat harga sangat miring sekali, itu yang saya senang.

Pertama, mungkin kalau kamarnya kecil saya maklum, tetapi maintenance nya sangat kurang,karpet kusam, kaca pembatas kamar mandi kotor dan tidak dibersihkan karena banyak bekas tangan, kursi dan meja berdebu seperti tidak pernah ditempati lama, marmer kamar mandi sudah kusam , lampu remang-remang bahkan yang saya tidak habis pikir bau pesing di ruang shower, sudah saya siram sabun berkali-kali tidak hilang juga (dan akhirnya pakai doa). Kesimpulannya, maintenancenya kurang, padahal dulu bagus.

Kedua, air minum teh dan kopi disiapkan seperti biasa, tetapi amenities di kamar mandi benar-benar serasa menginap di losmen, hanya sabun dan shampo tok. Bahkan sikat gigi pun tidak ada sama sekali (termasuk sandal juga tidak ada), mesti by request, yang celakanya harus menunggu sejam baru diantar karena staffnya sedikit. Serta di sini tidak ada kulkas.

Ketiga, tidak ada makan pagi sama sekali karena pandemi, tetapi saya maklum. Hanya hati-hati parkir di sini terbatas, kalau long weekend bisa tidak dapat parkir karena hotelnya mini.

Sayang beribu sayang, Serela Cihampelas, semoga engkau bangkit lagi, terutama maintenancenya diperhatikan walaupun do masa pandemi begini, untungnya harganya murah jadi tidak nyesek-nyesek amat.
title: Serela di Kala Pandemi, Sayang Sekali...

title: Merasa Puas

text: Sangat senang bisa menginap di Serela Hotel Cihampelas ini, kamar yang nyaman serta pelayanan yang memuaskan membuat saya merasa nyaman untuk berada di hotel, saya sangat berterimakasih kepada Ms.Rini yang telah membantu saya reservasi dimana ini adalah reservasi pertama saya jadi saya agak latah dalam hal reservasi, dia sangat sabar dalam membantu saya melakukan reservasi
title: Exellent Service

text:
Saya merasa sangat dikecewakan oleh perlakuan staff dan kebersihan di Serela Hotel Cihampelas.

1. Pada saat pertama kali melihat hotel ini, saya pikir hotel ini bisa menjadi salah satu tempat stay yang nyaman. Akan tetapi pada hari pertama saya menginap, sekitar pukul 2 dini hari saya terbangun dikarenakan ada serangga dan lipas di tempat tidur saya. Sampai2 badan saya merah dan gatal2. Bagaimana bisa? apakah jika tidak ada yg stay kamar tidak dicek?

Dan dari segi kebersihan karpet juga sangat tidak higienis. Mulai dari bercak coklat hingga hitam dimana-mana. 

Dan saya meminta kamar yang real non smoking, staff FO nya hanya memberitahu "sudah kami treatment". Oke lah treatment kami paham non smoking hanya di treatment supaya tidak bau asap rokok. Tapi saya tau karena AC nya central, tiba2 asap rokok memasuki ruangan. Sementara saya sedang hamil. Apakah jika terjadi apa2 akan ada pertanggung jawabannya?

2. Setelah saya menelepon FO untuk minta saran, akhirnya pihak FO memindahkan kamar yang baru. Dan dikamar yang baru ada signage non smoking. Dan saya minta tolong tempat tidurnya menjadi HW karena dari awal booking memang tempat tidur king size sudah full. Tapi hanya di rapatkan saja tempat tidurnya tanpa di ganti sprey seukuran kingsize. Kalau hanya digeser saya juga tidak perlu meminta tolong staff HK nya untuk menggeser.

3. Pada hari kedua sekitar jam 15.30 sore, saya meminta tolong staff FO yang bernama Ibnu untuk menyampaikan kpd pihak HK untuk membersihkan kamar yang saya tempati. Saya sudah pesan "untuk tempat tidurnya tolong sampaikan agar di jadikan HW karena kemarin malam pada saat pindah belum di HW kan". Dia mengiyakan hal tersebut.

Pada malam hari sekitar pukul 23.00 saya kembali ke kamar hotel untuk beristiraha, memang kondisi nya rapih dan semua yang terpakai sudah di ganti. Akan tetapi tempat tidurnya masih belum di HW kan. HW yang artinya menyatukan bukan berarti hanya di geser. Akan tetapi bed cover dan yg lain nya juga diganti menjadi ukuran besar. Bed cover untuk single size nya hanya ditumpuk menjadi 2 dan terlihat besar. What the hell is going on?

Apa saya berbicara kurang jelas kepada staff nya? 

4. Setelah itu saya berencana untuk meminjam peralatan makan. Setelah saya telpon ke bagian operator disambungkanlah ke bagian lain . Dan yang menerima telepon dari saya staff a.n Irwan. 

Saya hanya berbicara ingin meminjam. Dan staff tersebut menjawab "Dikenakan biaya jika meminjam 1 item dikenakan biaya charge 10k." Oke biaya rental per item 10k, akan tetapi apakah saya harus bayar kepada staff nya atau saya haru turun ke FO? Dikarenakan staff FO juga tidak meminta deposit pada saat saya checkin. Saya bingung karena setelah itu staff a.n Irwan berbicara "Karena takut hilang barangnya dan peraturan tsb dimulai dari skrg". Skrg?

Secara tidak langsung dia mengganggap kami akan mengambil barang tersebut dan menjadi pencuri?

Karena salah kata2 jujur saya merasa sangat tersinggung. Sebaiknya jika tidak mau ada kejadian seperti ini harus ada price list rental / kehilangan amanities selain towel dll. Atau setidaknya pihak FO menyampaikan hal tersebut karena ujung tanduk hotel nya jika salah penjelasan bisa jadi masalah besar. Sering saya menginap dihotel, mulai dari hotel budget hingga bintang 5 tapi baru kali ini saya di kecewakan sampai berulang2. Saya me report hal ini karena jg saya bekerja di bidang hospitality bertahun2, jd bukannya saya tidak tau bagaimana cara penyampaian yg baik dan benar atau tidaknya.

Harap di training kembali kepada staff2 nya, karena jika begitu terus hotel ini akan sepi dan rating/image hotel akan turun terus. 

Terutama pihal HRD yang mewawancara karyawan dan staff2 senior / spv harap mengawasi staff2 yang lain dan di bimbing agar bisa menyampaikan sesuatu lebih jelas dan tidak menyinggung siapapun.

text:
kami mendapatkan kamar yang menurut kami paling bagus view nya, karena menghadap persis ke jalan yang paling fenomenal di Bandung yaitu jalan Cihamplas, di mana semua orang belum kebandung klo belum ke Cihamplas, dan kami sekeluarga sangat menikmati suasana jalan cihamplas dari balcony kamar kami

luas kamar sangat memadai, sehingga dengan 2 anak sangat cukup dan nyaman, kebersihan kamar bagus, linen towel bagus

succes untuk Serela Cihamplas Bandung
title: Good Hotel in Prime Location

text: Pelayanan sangat baik oleh staff hotel yang ramah pada saat check in ... kamar nya bagus , bersih, cukup besar , semua staff ramah-ramah... terimakasih mba Paulina dan mba Yosarima ... enjoy to stay here
title: Pelayanan yang baik

text:
Utk resepsionis nya (mas adi) waktu check in pertama kali d hotel serela VERY GOOD n NICE SERVICE ,,,,meski handle sendiri dia bisa menguasai tamu yg cukup banyak 

*saran parkiran nya terlalu kecil dan yg tersedia jauh merepotkan tamu
title: Holiday ied with family

text:
Kamar luas ,Handuk bersih dan wangi.
Sayang nasi goreng ga ada rasa ikannya asin bangt.untuk wifi kadang ada sinyal kadang ga ...
Untuk lift cma ada 1 itu juga lama bangt nunggunya...
Pelayanan nya cukup baik petugas ramah
title: Liburan

text: Kamarnya bagus dan bersih, amenitiesnya cukup lengkap dan hairdryer juga tersedia, lokasinya strategis berada tepat di depan mall cihampelas. Pelayanannya baik khususnya welan (bellboy) yg sangt helpful
title: A nice place to stay

text: lokasi hotelnya strategis banget, keluar hotel langsung jalan cihampelas. disamping hotel juga ada yang jual cilok enak hehe. hotelnya bagus bersih, dan yang paling penting murah ! staff nya juga lumayan ramah. yang kurang hanya parkirannya yang minim. tapi selebihnya memuaskan
title: Strategis

text: Liburan sambil kerja sangat menyenangkan di hotel serela Cihampelas. Dibantu oleh staf Mas Adi yg sangat baik dan helpful. Lokasi strategis sangat dekat dengan Cihampelas Walk. Kamar nyaman dan cukup bersih. Sarapan enak, cm kurang kulkas aja.
title: Serella mengesankan

text: Lokasi hotel strategis, disekitar hotel banyak toko yg menjual suvenir dan berseberangan dengan Cihampelas Walk. Kamar hotel cukup nyaman, makanan juga cukup enak. Resepsionis ramah, pelayanan cukup baik. Hanya sayang tempat parkirnya tidak luas sehingga ketika akan menggunakan kendaraan harus menunggu cukup lama. Tapi bapak petugas valet parkir ramah dan sangat membantu kami perihal parkir kendaraan.
title: Nyaman dan lokasi dekat dengan tempat penjualan suvenir

text: Haduhhhh hotelnya keren, kesannya wemah tapi terjangkau, Receptionis yang namanya Adi juga Ramah.  Hotelnya bersih dan nyaman. Pokoknya recomended banget kalo yg lagi liburan di cihampelas bandung. Ajak Kawan,  Keluarga,  Pasangan Kamu Ke Serela Cihampelas Bandung
title: Pelayanan Prima

text:
Hotel nyaman, dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan. Pelayanan ramah terutama ke bayi. Resepsionis ramah dan sangat membantu sekali. Terima kasih tante sisilia, tante paul dan om adi (front desk). :)
Will be stay at Serela next time.
title: Hotel nyaman & pelayanan ramah

text: Lokasi strategis sangat dekat dengan CIWALK dan Skywalk, pelayanan yg ramah dan proses cepat saat check in yg dibantu sama mas adi dan thanks untuk welcome snack nya enaaak, tempat parkir memanf sempit tapi kita dibantu vallet

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Hampir setiap bulan saya berkunjung ke bandung untuk tujuan bisnis dan liburan. Hampir setiap ke bandung saya menyempatkan diri menginap di Serela Cihampelas. Selain hotel ini berada di pusat perbelanjaan Ciwalk, juga hotel cukup strategis. Namun kunjungan saya kali ini di hotel ini agak sedikit mengecewakan. Tercoreng oleh beberapa oknum pegawai yang kurang kooperatif, dan terkesan keramahannya dipaksanakan. Saya check in di hotel ini hari kamis siang, tanggal 26 Januari 2017, petugas sekuriti yang bertugas saat itu sangat kurang kooperatif. Biasanya kalau ada tamu yang datang selalu disambut dan dilayani. Namun kondisi ini agak berbeda dari kebiasaannya, dimana petugas sekuriti duduk dipojok hanya melihat-lihat saja tamu yang baru datang. Bukan karena saya ingin dihormati, tetapi perubahan kebiasaan ini yg mengganjal hati saya untuk saya ungkapkan agar pihak manajemen dapat menegur sekuriti tersebut. Hal yang mengganjal lagi saat di restoran waktu breakfast. Kebetulan saya mengajak keluarga sehingga menempati 2 room. Saat breakfast, saya sempat diinformasikan oleh petugas restoran (Angga) bahwa saya harus menambah biaya makan, karena terdapat 5 orang dewasa. Padahal saya sudah sampaikan bahwa jatah saya diberikan saja pada yang lainnya, dalam arti saya tidak ikut makan hanya minum saja pagi itu agar tetap dihitung 4 orang dewasa untuk fasilitas 2 room. Kondisi membuat saya kurang enak hati. Terkesan petugas tersebut seperti pelayan warung kaki lima. Sontak juga keramahannya berubah terhadap keluarga saya setiap kami mau breakfast. Dua hal tersebut menjadi catatan saya. Namun secara keseluruhan hotel ini tetap menjadi rekomendasi saya untuk menginap saat liburan di bandung.
title: Januari di Serela Cihampelas Hotel Bandung

owner_response.text:
Kepada yang terhormat Bpk. Dharmajaya,

Terima kasih bapak sudah meluangkan waktu untuk menulis pengalaman sewaktu tinggal di Serela Cihampelas Hotel.

Kami mohon maaf karena bapak sempat mengalami hal yang kurang nyaman atas sikap dari staff kami. Juga mengenai penambahan biaya breakfast, hal ini sudah merupakan kebijakan hotel kami yaitu bila lebih dari 2 orang yang breakfast akan dikenakan biaya tambahan. Anak berusia 5 sampai 12 tahun akan dikenakan biaya sebesar Rp. 55.000,-/orang sedangkan yang berusia lebih dari 12 tahun akan dikenakan biaya full 1 pax yaitu sebesar Rp. 110.000.- /orang, Kami mohon maaf apabila kenyamanan bapak tertanggu atas hal ini. Kami akan meningkatkan kualitas pelayanan kami, semoga bapak dapat memakluminya.

Sekali lagi kami ucapkan terima kasih atas ulasan yang telah bapak berikan kepada kami, kami berharap dapat menyambut kedatangan bapak kembali di Serela Cihampelas Hotel Bandung di waktu yang akan datang.

Warmest Regards,

text:
kami salah satu pengunjung yang dibilang sering menginap di hotel Serela, karena pekerjaan kami sebagai penyelenggara event. Di Serela Cihampelas, kami awal bulan november ini menginap seminggu penuh, disini pelayanan dari pertama masuk area Serela Cihampelas (parkiran) hingga menuju kamar pasti kami jumpai senyuman dari setiap karyawan Serela Cihampelas, tibalah di kamar 103, dengan balkon kecil yg cukup untuk menikmati angin kota bandung bersama wanginya kopi, kamar yang sangat nyaman, walau sedikit sempit, kamar mandi yang bersih juga fasilitas lainnya sangat membuat kami nyaman didalamnya, sayang nya tidak ada kolam renang. . tiba saat makan malam, menu yang di sajikan lumayan enak, walaupun sering kami jumpai varian menu itu di hotel Serela Cihampelas, maupun Serela Merdeka.. 
Kamar 103 tempat kami menginap sedikit terganggu kenyamanannya, karena ketika itu sedang diadakan pembangunan proyek "CIHAMPELAS SKYWALK", walaupun kamar nya kedap suara, bising dari alat berat di jalan cihampelas tetap terdengar kedalam kamar.

Lokasi tepat di tengah pusat perbelanjaan Ciwalk, Juga Cihampelas, menjadikan daya tarik tersendiri untuk Client kami yang menginap Serela Cihampelas juga sayangnya area parkir kendaraan cukup sulit dan sempit namun..

Terimakasih.

text:
STAFF :
(+) Super ramah, 
Bellboy yang helpful, Security yang ramah, Resepsionis yang humble, staf kitchen yang sigap terhadap kebutuhan tamu. Bahkan ketika menginformasikan tentang keterbatasan jemputan/antaran ke bandara, tetap dengan senyum dan SOLUTIF, saya dibantu mencari Taksi dengan sigap
(-) Tidak ada

KAMAR :
(+) Kualitas Tidur
Kamar Kedap suara, bukan yang terbaik tapi sama sekali tidak buruk. Korden yang 100% gelap, pancahayaan yang pas untuk tidur
(+) Kelengkapan
Masuk kamar dan kelengkapan tidak ada yang kurang satu pun, Sandal, kotak penyimpanan, air mineral teh, kopi, gula (brown, low, white) tersedia rapih beserta heaternya. Televisi jernih, ada beberapa channel yang sedikit gangguan tappi tidak mengganggu. Channel anak-anak lancar jaya, anak saya betah di hotel. Remote TV tidak ngadat dll. AC dingin, 
(+) Kamar Mandi
Air hangat selalu tersedia dengan stabil, ada hairdryer, kelengkapan mandi mulai sabun, shampoo, sikat, pasta, shower cap, kantong plastik, dll semua ada.
(-) Tidak ada.

LOKASI :
(+) Di depan Mall Ciwalk. Say No more.
(-) Lokasi parkir motor yang kurang dan terkena hujan

MAKANAN :
(+) Saya tidak terlalu picky pada sarapan, seringnya hanya roti dan pelengkapnya.
(-) Hanya saja, pada pelengkap Roti, kurang satu.. Selai KEJU ! Hahaha

EXTRAS :
(+) Rooftop dengan view yang indah.
(+) Lobby dengan luas yang pas
(+) Bisa Nitip Bagasi ketika belum checkin/ setelah checkout
(-) Tarif extend 1/2 hari yang sempat berubah-ubah, untung saya mendapat yang termurah 25% rate.
(-) Antaran Bandara yang saat saya menginap tidak tersedia karena mobil rusak.

So kesimpulan saya... What you get is worth the price. TOP

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Saya sering menginap di beberapa hotel yang ada di kota Bandung saat saya berkunjung ke kota ini. Pada kunjungan di minggu terakhir bulan Juli 2016 ini saya putuskan untuk menginap di Serela Hotel yang berlokasi di jalan cihampelas. Mulanya saya rencana hanya menginap untuk 1 malam saja di hotel ini. Namun karena pelayanan yang saya terima di hotel ini sangat baik maka keesokan harinya saya memutuskan untuk tetap menginap di hotel ini. Hotel ini terasa berbeda di bandingkan hotel lainnya yang pernah saya datangi. Memang banyak sih hotel di bandung ini. Tapi rasanya agak beda saja, terasa nyaman, apalagi saya di tempatkan di kamar yang memberikan kemudahaan bagi mata saya untuk memandang dari berbagai sudut kota Bandung. Sungguh indah sekali. Belum lagi di lantai paling atas gedung hotel ini ada tempat santai yang asyik untuk nongkrong sama temen atau keluarga. Hal yang membuat saya bertambah nyaman adalah petugasnya yang mayoritas ramah, mulai dari security (pak Dedi, dkk) siap membantu saya, petugas FO nya terkhusus untuk neng Pamela yang super ramah, pegawai restoran yang sangat responsive dalam melayani. Yah pokoknya saya merasa dilayani dengan baik. Hal ini berimplikasi pada keputusan saya untuk melanjutkan menginap di hotel ini hingga 4 hari. Saat saya mau berangkat ke Surabaya, saya dianter oleh pak Sofian ke bandara. Aduh-aduh... kurang apalagi nih pelayanannya. Akan menjadi kesan tersendiri bagi saya jika berkunjung ke bandung akan menginap di Serela Hotel Cihampelas. Bagi teman-teman yang hobby travelling dan kebetulan mau ke Bandung, coba deh nginep di Serela Cihampelas. Harganya cukup terjangkau, dengan pelayanan yang prima. Terima kasih atas pelayanannya saat saya berada disini. Semoga tetap dipertahankan dan terus ditingkatkan penilaian baik ini. Sukses buat manajemen Serela Cihampelas Hotel, terutama buat Pak Andrian.
title: Kunjungan Pertama Yang Mengesankan

text:
Saya  menginap pada tanggal 26 Juni 2016 di kamar 301 dan 303 berikut ulasan saya : 

1. Lokasi (rating ✴✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- pusat kota Bandung. 
- terletak di jalan cihampelas, yg terkenal pusat celana jeans. 
- disebrang ciwalk mall. 
- banyak tempat kuliner di sekililing hotel. 
- banyak angkutan umum dan taksi.
Minus : 
- setiap sore apalagi weekend pusatnya kemacetan.
- parkiran sangat sempit sehingga harus valet parking.

2. Fasilitas (rating ✴✴✴)
Plus :
- free WIFI di setiap kamar yg cukup baik koneksinya.
- room service 24 jam.
- restoran.
- spa.
Minus : 
- tidak ada swimming pool.
- tidak ada corner kids.

3. Bedroom (rating ✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- interior bagus.
- luas kamar yg di upgrade diatas superior sangat luas. 
- kasur cukup empuk dan nyaman.
- ada 2 buah bantal besar yg cukup empuk.
- ada kettel pemanas air beserta kopi/teh.
- ada 2 buah botol air mineral. 
- ada brangkas.
- tv flat yg dilengkapi dengan siaran tv kabel.
- ac bekerja dengan baik dan dingin.
- kebersihan cukup terjaga dengan baik.
Minus : 
- kamar yg superior tidak begitu luas hanya 18 meter.
- kurang kedap suara.

4. Bathroom (rating ✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- kebersihan kamar mandi cukup terjaga dengan baik.
- kamar mandi tidak begitu luas tapi cukup. 
- amenites mandi standar ada sabun, odol, sikat gigi dan hairdryer.
- air panas lancar.
Minus : 
- di kamar superior kran di closet rusak.

5. Food and Beverage (rating - )
Saya tidak membeli sarapan di hotel.

6. Service (rating ✴✴✴✴✴)
Plus : 
- semua pegawai ramah dan selalu greetings.
- proses c.in dan c.out cukup cepat.
- pegawai fo pada saat c.in saya lupa namanya yg cowok sangat ramah dan malah mengupgrade kamar saya. Terimakasih banyak y mas.

Kesimpulan : 
Saya rekomendasikan hotel ini untuk liburan maupun dinas kepada para pembaca tripadvisor dengan budget yg murah kita bisa tidur di hotel dekat ciwalk.

text:
Menginap 5 malam sejak 28 Agustus - 2 September 2014, mendapatkan pelayanan dan sambutan khas grup Kagum Hotel yang memang ramah dan responsif.

Kesan pertama, lokasi mudah ditemukan. Tepat di seberang Cihampelas Walk. Memudahkan bagi yang pertama kali menginap, juga memudahkan bagi yang berniat tuk berbelanja. Lokasinya, sempurna. Meski memang, area parkir cenderung kurang luas dan jalan Cihampelas yang seringkali macet pada waktu tertentu.

Ketika masuk, lobi hotel belum disediakan kursi. Meski ada kursi restoran yang bersebelahan (atau menyatu?) dengan area lobi. Proses check in cepat. Staf pun penuh keramahan.

Memasuki kamar tipe superior, secara jujur saya mendapati kesan 'sempit ya?'. Mungkin bila dibandingkan dengan kamar di beberapa hotel Kagum yang lain. Namun, luas kamar 18 meter persegi sudah cukup nyaman bagi bepergian sendiri atau berdua. Kebersihan kamar sangat sempurna, fasilitas kamar pun lengkap. Hanya saja kadang tayangan di televisi kamar, sinyalnya lemah bahkan hilang (kerap saya dapati di FOX Movies Premium dan HBO). Sisanya, kenyamanan dan pemandangan jendela kamar yang sempurna.

Oh iya, untuk layanan kamar mungkin belum ada ya? Di kamar saya belum dapatkan infonya. Pun penanda yang digunakan untuk memberi tahu petugas agar kamar dibersihkan atau penghuni kamar jangan diganggu.

Menu sarapan, variasi dan rasanya mantap. Menginap lima malam, tidak satu kali pun menu utamanya persis sama. Pun juga ada bubur, roti, kue, soto, sereal, dan salad yang melengkapi.

Secara keseluruhan, hotel ini menawarkan kenyamanan tuk tinggal dan berbelanja. Meski memang ada beberapa kekurangan yang saya rasakan, seperti lift yang hanya satu misalnya, tapi tidak mengurangi penilaian memuaskan yang menurut saya pantas disematkan.

Akhirnya, saya punya satu lagi pilihan hotel yang menyenangkan di kota Bandung. :)
title: Strategis, Terjangkau, Memuaskan.

owner_response.text:

Mengenai masukan Bapak terkait kursi di lobby dan kelengkapan fasilitas kamar lainnya  masih dalam proses pengadaan, kami juga sangat menyesali ke tidaknyamanan Bapak dikarenakan sinyal TV yang lemah dibeberapa channel, namun sudah diperbaiki oleh departemen terkait. 

Kami berterima kasih atas apresiasi Bapak terhadap variasi dan rasa dari menu breakfast yang kami sajikan, adalah tugas kami untuk selalu mempertahankan dan meningkatkan kualitas dari produk dan layanan yang kami berikan.


Kami senantiasa menantikan kedatangan Bapak kembali untuk menginap di Serela Cihampelas Hotel  Bandung di kunjungan Bapak selanjutnya.

Salam,

text:
I was staying at this hotel for 4 nights. A very good hotel with some exceptions:

Cons:
1. No mini bar in the room, not good for those love fruits.
2. Very limited hangers (only 3 units).
3. Average wifi speed.
4. No ironing. You would have to ask the hotel staff to iron it for your with at a  small fee.
5. Whilst the breakfast was good however at the wrong time or place., the lettuce salad was dirty (not properly washed) there was some dark residues.
6. The bathroom sink need to be clean (yellowish stain).

Pros:
1. Location, location, location. Ciwalk is just at a few steps from the hotel. You can just pass by the road or you can use the newly built Cihampelas skywalk.
2. Lots of shops selling low grade quality stuff if you are at budget or looking for some ole-ole (souvenirs).
3. The hotel provide good selection of breakfast buffet menu as compared to other similar range hotels. Plenty of table and chairs in a sufficient dining area.
4. The hotel staff are helpful at your convenience.
5. My room was properly cleaned and organized by the housekeeping staff.

To conclude, I might be returning to this hotel in the future especially its location.
title: Located next to Ciwalk

When my friends and i arrived at this hotel, we were at first a bit disappointed that the road right in front of the hotel was under heavy upgrade. So all our cabs arrived to pick us up in great difficulty. The hotel room was relatively small despite its grand entrance. 

But we were very satisfied with their customer service especially the front desk, They were very polite, and friendly. One lady named Allin (or Novilla) was particularly helpful and gave us foreigners a lot of good tips as to where to visit, and she speaks English very well. Our request for room service was always attended to promptly by the hotel and it really has helped our experience in the stay. 

The breakfast there for the first day was so-so but as they listened to our request, the breakfast variety got a bit more satisfactory as the days passed. 

All in all a memorable and good experience.

text:
The main reason as to why I choose Serela Cihamplas is the location which is within walking distance to Cihampelas Walk mall. My choice, to my surprise, turned out to be disappointing. The hotel, in my opinion, is not well managed and by the time I stayed there, the street in front of the hotel was under construction. 

The traffic was outrageously congested and busy making the hotel's guests difficult to find parking spaces. However, the majority of the staff were so helpful and friendly, except one of the housekeeping staff who was too occupied and not bothered to greet the guests. 

My room was quite basic with very limited tv channel selection. They however provide us with toiletries and hair dryer inside the bathroom. The water pressure was not strong enough and the shower above our head kept dripping. The restaurant for breakfast is located on the ground floor and, honestly, the meals served were nothing special in terms of taste and variety. 

This hotel is not recommended for family travellers, but it could be perfect for couples or single traveller who seek simplicity and proximity to one the most popular malls in Bandung.
title: Not Properly Managed

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Rudy,

Warm greetings.

Allow me on behalf of Serela Cihampelas Hotel Bandung to extend our thanks to you for having stayed with us and also a deepest apology for all the various inconveniences that you experienced during your stay with us. We will alert our Housekeeping team to train its member better to greet our guests and we will try to fix the water pressure as well as the dripping shower issues. We will also notify our kitchen team to better diversify the food available for our guests to enjoy during breakfast and any other dining occasions. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you again hopefully soon.

Best regards,
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Room no.601
6th floor
Stayed for 6 nights.
Checked-in 27th October 2016 
Checked-out 2nd november 2016

Customer service:
1. Excellent
2. Friendly and very welcoming and helpful.
3. 1 week before the arrival Ms.Deborah has been assisting me and updating me on the room reservation.
4. Due to the current construction at the skywalk and how noisy it can be, our Room was upgraded from superior to the grand deluxe room for FREE.
5. It was our pre-honeymoon trip before the wedding, Ms.Deborah has arranged a beautiful petals of roses decorated in our room and we had such a romantic ambience in our room.
6. Upon checking-in it was smooth and Mr.Sufian helped us to carry our luggage and he has been such a great help through out our stay in the hotel.
7. Ms.Sally has been very kind and helpful through out our stay by making sure that we had a good time and making sure that the housekeeper is doing their job.
8. Ms.Paulina has been great too for helping out with our transport and our parcels that was delivered to the hotel.
9. We Checked out at 5.45am (bandung time) receptionist gave us a wakeup-call, arranged a taxi for our transport to airport, helped out with our luggage and it was all smooth and good.

House-keeping:
1. Cleanliness of the room i shall give 90/100 as i spotted few stains on the bedsheet. But overall the room is quite clean, the pillows and bed is very comfy and huge.
2. House-keepers tend to forget and left their cleaning tools in the room after cleaning up the room.
They even forgot to top-up our toiletteries such as the hair and body shampoo, even the coffee and tea. Only given upon request (which shouldnt happend.)
3. We wanted to ordered in-house yet they forgot to provide the menu in the room. But the food came in on time and it was splendid. So its all good.
4. We left some valuable items in the room and forgot to close the safe box and we called the hotel not to enter or to make-up the room but when we came back, the room was cleaned, yet nothing is missing. So all i can say, they are very good and honest people. 

Location wise:
1. Super duper close with the famous cihampelas walk. Just a 3mins walk. 
2. Money changer is just at the left side of the hotel. So its quite convenient and they opens 24hrs. Just 3mins walk from the hotel too.
3. Youll find some small shops and stalls along the street too. 
4. From bandung airport to this hotel will takes 15-20mins depending on the traffic as currently there's an ongoing construction at the cihampelas walk.
5. 30minutes to the city of bandung by taxi (depending on the traffic).
6. 15minutes to paris van java by taxi.

Hotel transport:
1. If you needed a taxi to be arranged from the hotel, a minimum of RP50,000 will be charged. (They use blue bird taxi service)

Kitchen section:
1. Breakfast was good but they dont have much of an option but still good. 
2. Kitchen staff was quite friendly and very helpful and always there for us whenever we needed for any assistance.
3. We tried the in-house food aswell, the nasi goreng serela and the mee goreng soup was SPLENDID!!!price wise is quite cheap for a hotel food and the quantity. So we were happy and satisfied.

All and all, i would love to come back to this hotel for my next trip to bandung. I couldnt find any other hotel that will make me feel at home and comfortable. Yes they might have some small itsy bitsy flaws but the people and how they treat you just made it all up and made you feel happy at the end of the day. Even after 2 days leaving bandung, i received a very warm and sweet message from Ms.Deborah saying thank you for staying at Serela Hotel. Comes to show how they really take care of their customer. 

Thank you Serela Hotel for having us for the past 6nights. Me and fiance had a great time. Sorry i didnt get the name of the other staff who have attended us, nevertheless, me and fiance would like to say THANK YOU for the great 6 nights in Serela Hotel and most of all thank you for being great!
title: Excellent Customer Service

owner_response.text:

On behalf of Serela Cihampelas Hotel Bandung, I would like to say thank you very much for having stayed with us along with your fiancee! It has been a great pleasure serving you both, and we will most definitely take your various concerns about your stay to heart so that should you (and hopefully your fiancee as well) decide to come back to us again in the future, you can enjoy a much better staying experience.

text:
Worst experience ever. Booked at serela cihampelas but my booking was cancelled when i arrived there.

My husband and i went to this hotel and we are supposed to stay from 18-22sept to celebrate our anniversary there. The moment we want to check in, we were informed that our booking was cancelled by the staff as the hotel was booked by the Pekan Olahraga Nasional (PON) athletes/officials. We were shocked as we have paid the total amount via credit card and it was a nightmare for us. They apologized and informed that we will be transferred to another serela hotel which is in setiabudhi (approx 15mins fr serela cihampelas). 

The most ridiculous part was one of the staffs (Susan Nova) claimed that they were unable to inform me earlier regarding the cancellation as they could not get my contact number & information due to Agoda's policy (this is absurd if this is true). I was furious when they mentioned this excuse to me, as i have emailed the hotel personally after i made the reservation as i wanted the hotel to decorate our room (note: i still have my email to them). Further, i personally called the hotel on 5th sept and spoken to Alfin since they didnt respond to my email. I also leave my email address to Alfin to ensure that my room is decorated for my anniversary. 

When i showed my email to them, they asked me to wait for a while so as to allow them to check my email in their mailbox and they said that they didnt receive my email at all (i have to wait almost an hour due to this situation). However, they do admit that they received my phone call and the reservation for PON athletes has yet to finalise when i spoken to alfin. Since they have my email address, they can always email me. Whatever it is, this is not an acceptable excuse as i made my reservation in July and paid in full. Do i want to stay again in this hotel or other hotels under the same group (Kagum hotel)? Absolutely NOT. Do i want to book other hotel via Agoda? Maybe.

I have submitted my review at Agoda's website & it seems that my review is not published by them. So i decided to write my review here.
title: Worst experience!

text: Serela cihampelas is just a 3 minutes walk to ciwalk mall and all the street food, and jeans street. Location is the best for a simple hotel.  Mosque us nearby.Room is big enough for 2. Got a room with street view and hill   and city view.which was great and also the traffic view from window just outside the hotel.Have to thank housekeeping for their effort in their job which tbey take pride in. Room service was fast and efficient. The menu was good and tasty. Very reasonably priced. Had a welcome drink in the lobby. Front desk was busy as there was a steady flow of customers checking in at all times. Special mention  and my deepest gratitude to Mr. Muji the bell man who when i was unwell went out of his way to get me a glass of hot chocolate milk and a bar of chocalate for my gastrictis. Aslo thanks to the hotels team of dedicated staff of restaurant staff, housekeeping, front desk, concierge, and valet who took great care of us when we stayed there. They made our stay as confortable and pleasant at all times. Kudos to the all the guys who is working on the entrance side if the hotel.Did not try their breakfast buffet so i cant review it.Tbere are taxis just outside CIwalk to get to anypkace you want. Traffic is very bad outside hotel but no issues as there is a traffic warden who will gladly be able to help you cross the road with ease. Mall opposie hotel is huge. Suoermarket, cineplex, branded stores, japanese, korean indonesian, chinese,peranakan restaurants are all in the ciwalk mall. The location of hotel is good. There are a few better hotels in the vicinity but serela cihampelas us good enoughfor me at the rates they are offering . Bed was confortable but no minibar in hotel room which was a let down. No storage space for luggage and the clothes rack was too high to reach. No cupboard to put your clothes in. So taking these into consideration i would suggest anyone who plans on staying do see if these amenities is ok with you if you intend to stay here. Only 1 room category available in this hotel and no swimming pool. Thanks again to all the staffs and keep up the good work.
title: Bandung

text:
Me n my boyfriend stayed at this hotel for our 5days4nights bandung trip. I planned to give him a surprise birthday celebration with the help of management of this hotel. The staffs are responsive when I sent them email and called them for this arrangement and surprisingly they didn't charged me for the decoration and helped me to buy a birthday cake for my boyfriend (cake is charged of course :D).. Me n my bf were so satisfying with their arrangements of the room decoration. Really love the room decoration! Thanks to fitri and thanks to staffs who helped me to decorate it and arranged it. Great great thanks to u guys! I left my beautiful memories here with my bf 💏 

The staffs here are friendly and always smile at us whenever we met them even the guard standing outside ! Their smile warmth our heart ♥ and made us feel more like going 🏡 home! I want to praised hard for their service! Doing so well and keep it up! 

Next,  the location of this hotel is super good! There is an open air shopping mall called cihampelas walk opposite to the hotel, u can just walk there and various type of food u can find there, like Indonesian cuisine, Korean cuisine, Japanese cuisine so on. There was a Nike and Adidas sale on the last day of our trip, so cheap yet we had insufficient time to grab this sale as we were rushing to the airport. This hotel is really good with its location as u Don have to travel so far to find food or go for shopping. Some nightlife activities too happening near the hotel but no worries, cause u Don feel noisy at all inside the room. 

Although this hotel has only one passenger lift, but I Don think it's a problem cause we Don usually wait for too long. The lift is quite efficiency tho.

The only thing dissatisfying is the breakfast as no much choices. Almost having the same dishes everyday. So I hope management pls look into this problem or maybe change new menu sometimes :) and last but not least,  the WiFi is slow especially during night time around 10pm -2am.. So pls maximise the WiFi speed. 

Thanks so much again to serela cihampelas and I had a grateful stay during my trip! Definitely would like to visit again in future!
title: Rated 5 stars service with friendly staffs and strategy location

Overall the hotel was fine. Our room was tired looking, though. Carpet showed lots of wear, sheets were stained, and the towels were more gray than white. HBO signal was poor on the television. text:
Let's start with the positives.

-Great location (not very far from airport, right next to an upscale mall, LOADS of shops on the same street)
-Good breakfast, don't miss out on their noodles! Selection was okay, there are staples such as chicken porridge and toast but quality was pretty high throughout.
-Staff were courteous and helpful, always greeting whenever we walked past. 
-Rooms were generally clean and rather generously spaced
-Street is rather busy and therefore, easy to get taxis if needed. Reception can call one for you too!

Negatives

-There was a stain on my room's carpet, not sure what it is from or why it was not cleaned. Not a major issue.
-Toilet had clear glass facing the rest of the room. Pretty much a free show for your roomie. However there is a blind installed that you can roll down.
-Rooms did not come with a fridge or minibar, though they provide 2 bottles of mineral water, a kettle and a selection of teas and coffees. Price list was not found, so I assume they are complimentary.
-Even though we were given smoker-free rooms, there was a cigarette smell in the toilet and air was stale in the room when we first checked in. Largely cleared after we left the air-conditioning running for a few hours. 
-WiFi was a slow and sometimes, even though signal was strong, it would disconnect.Not sure why. Ended up using my data plan instead most of the time.
-Towels provided smelt stale, even though we asked for a change when making our room.
-Basic toiletries are provided. Unfortunately, only 1 dental kit was supplied even though it is a twin room.
-Only one lift services the building, so you might have trouble getting up or down during peak periods (mornings and evenings)

All in all, a very enjoyable stay. The negatives aren't really major issues and easily remedied. Loved my 3 nights there.
title: Great value for money!

text:
WITHOUT PRIDE NOR PREJUDICE 

stayed just a night - there are many hotels along the central busy street of cihampilas but I find this hotel very clean and definitely strategic 

Staff - Very friendly 
Breakfast - simple but good enough ( reception actually bothers to call to inform you of breakfast ending time )
Location - very good
Rooms - cannot complaint for the price you pay yet decent enough. Plenty of TV channel choices. Hot water and pressure is good.

Overall is pretty good. The only thing I find is that the hotel lacks certain level of privacy. Cover up dinning area from sitting area and curtain up breakfast area from the open surrounding would make guests feel not so exposed. Otherwise no other complaints.
title: Simple good hotel

text:
Stayed here from the 8th of September till 11th of September. We arrived quite early,around 11+ am and we were allowed to check in as our room was ready. When we first arrived at the hotel,i was very impressed at how the hotel staffs were friendly and always smiling and greeting us. Felt very welcome. When we entered our room,i was satisfied at how the condition of the room was as it was just nice for the two of us.There was even a fruit platter waiting for us. There wasn't any wardrobe in the room but that was ok for us. 

One of the front desk staff even recommended what to eat at the nearby Cihampelas Walk (which is just a 5 minutes walk). We did eat at the recommended eatery which is Tong Tji. The food was delicious and value for money. Hotel is just in front of the famous Jeans Street and it was easy for us to do our shopping!!

As for the breakfast,there isn't a wide spread but the food is nice. You could go without the breakfast as you can get many eateries around at Cihampelas Walk. Overall,i would certainly return to this hotel on my next trip to Bandung!
title: Very strategic location and wonderful staffs!!

text:
Stayed for 4 nights in Serela Cihampelas Bandung.  As this was our first time in Bandung, we were not pretty sure of the location and surroundings.  But upon arriving, we were very surprised and delighted to know that it is just located across of Cihampelas Mall.  Very strategic location where you can just hail a cab to travel to other places such as factory outlets in Jln Dago & Jln Riau, Pasar Baru within minutes minus the traffic of course. Really love the atmosphere in Ciwalk especially at night when it really comes alive.

The rooms are perfect for couples.  Bed are really comfortable, cool bathroom :), but the absence is a refrigerator but that does not matter much to us as we can just walk down to shops nearby to get a cold drink.  Wifi is good and strong.  Breakfast has fair variety of delicacies.

Last but not least, what 's a place without happy, smiley, cheerful faces.  Yeah, special thanks to front office staffs, Yustia & Pamela especially who were very helpful and informative.  The smiles and greetings from both of you and also from all the other staffs, from the bell boy, security and restaurant staffs really made our stay an awesome one!!  Will definitely return to stay in this hotel again if we are in Bandung again
title: Excellent Location & Super friendly staff

text:
I booked Serela Cihampelas after reading Tripadvisor and thought I stumbled upon a gem.  But...

(1) We asked for a non-smoking room.  The staff assured us that the entire hotel is non-smoking.  But in reality both rooms reeked of years of smoking.  It felt like no one attempted even to neutralise the smell or even to mask it with some fragrance.  I am allergic to cigarette smoke and smell, and had to spend some money at the supermarket air freshers.  But they did not help.  I had to endure three days of migraine after leaving the hotel.

(2) My room window looked out to a building under construction.  I thought "Ok, I will just deal with it" and draw the curtains all the time.  But unfortunately the construction carried on 24 hours a day, even at 3am.  I woke up and looked out wondering what the noise was, and right out there were half a dozen men standing at about the level of my room, some staring at me.  The hammering continued to the early hours of the morning until we left for sightseeing.

(3) The room itself was okay but the bathroom left much to be desired.  As many other guests have noted, the towels were terrible.  Totally thinned out and very very gray (from an original white I presume).  My wife thought they were the floor mats and out them on the ground, only to realise they were the bath towels.  Drying one's face and body with those things... I don't know how to describe the feeling - I felt miserable.

(4) The breakfast was alright but the international/western items were few. I am Asian and I can deal with more rice and noodles.  But maybe this hotel has more Indonesian tourists than international ones.

(5) The staff were generally nice and polite, and powerless to do anything about the condition of the hotel.  They will just write a nice, polite reply to this and go on to check in the next guest....
title: Nice location and staff, but....

text:
I had read some TripAdvisor reviews of this hotel prior to staying there, particularly I remember someone is complaining of the shower. It is because the bath experience/quality of a hotel has always been one of deciding factors for me in choosing a hotel. I thought perhaps the reviewer before me is only having bad luck by getting bad room (sometimes we always do). 

It turns out, my shower is also having problems with water temperature. It is either cold, or too hot. You may have to FINE TUNE several times to get desired medium temperature. There are two shower attached to the wall. One is the big rain shower, and another is reguler shower. Normally when you switch the button, the water will go through either the rain shower or the regular shower. This is not the case with my room, no matter how you push the switch, water will come out from both shower. Toilet shower is dripping waters all the time. And the most unpleasant experience of it all, there is only MINIMUM water pressure in my room. I feel like this hotel does not have enough electric water pumps. Just like at my home when electricity is out and we had to use gravity to get water.

Towel is a bit grayish. One use of the towel instantly give the towel a damp smell. I asked for additional towel from the staff, and it never came to my room.

Room design is quite good, whole floor is carpeted (which is a plus for me). Room size is small. Wifi speed is good enough. Air conditioner has this loud whirling fan sound. No matter how low I set the air-con, the fan still emits loud sound from it. So for a sensitive sleeper like me, I found it a bit hard to sleep.

No swimming pools.

Breakfast, very limited choices. If you are looking for good breakfast, you don't go to this hotel. Period.

Location is very good. This hotel is situated in the middle of Bandung city side and Bandung tourist area. Also, directly opposite Cihampelas Walk mall and a few cheap low quality factory outlets.
title: Strategic location, and for the rest all I can say is, Bed & Breakfast!

text:
My family and I stayed at Serela Cihampelas for 4 nights last weekend and it was generally a pleasant experience, but with some disappointments unfortunately.

The bad: the bathroom definitely needs a lot more care. I learned from some of the staff that this hotel is only about a year old, however some parts of the walls in the bathroom and laminates in both rooms we occupied have already cracked and peeled. The shower heads provided extremely weak water pressure, and it was nearly impossible to adjust the temperature of the water to a comfortable level - it was either burning hot, or ice cold. Same thing happened with the tap at the basin. Plumbing for the toilet bowl wasn't working well either. Had some problems with the flushing on the second night and got housekeeping to have a look at it but they were unable to fix the problem and we ended up with a choked toilet bowl for the rest of our stay.

However, apart from the unfortunate experiences with the bathroom, I definitely have to compliment the staff at the hotel for their impeccable service. They were always smiling, and always willing to lend a hand, regardless of how small your request is. Kudos to the front desk staff especially, for going out of their way to recommend day trips and for taking the initiative to have actual conversations with us. Our interaction with the staff at Serela Cihampelas was definitely testament to the warmth and great hospitality Indonesians are famous for.

Overall great location, value for money, and exceptional service, but please do pay more attention to the maintenance of the bathrooms!
title: Hits & Misses

text:
The stay was very comfortable, the location of the hotel is also very good. Just as the hotel name suggests, Cihampelas Walk is just opposite. Most the the restaurant open till late, so no worries for supper! There are also many cartoon themed clothes stall opposite and along the same stretch of road. 

However, the housekeeping of the hotel could be improved. Towels were not changed on the first night, instead, was folded back and placed back. How we knew as because the towel, not only do not have "soap" smell but it felt wet and damp. but after highlighting to them, it was changed the subsequent days. So we are ok with it. 

Another small issue was that, the housekeeping did not clear the cups. We did not expect the room to be spick and span, but I think clearing used cups (with coffee inside) is minimum housekeeping. And the sink area have wet stains - this shows that the sink was not wiped at all. 

On the last day, perhaps it is a different housekeeper, the sink area was wiped clean. thumbs up! So I guess, the previous experiences were stand alone issues. So overall, we are happy with the service and quality of the room! We will still return! :)
title: Good Location, Comfortable Stay

text: I put up at this hotel with my friend through  Jack Tour arrangement  . It is situated just opposite Cihampelas Walk ,a shopping mall that has all your needs . Tell the hotel  security and they will flag a cab for you. They will make sure the driver knows your destination before you get into the car .  The room in the hotel  is spick and span with daily room service and is spacious enough for the two of us .Even we could enjoy our yoga practice  on the floor carpet.  You will be greeted warmly with their genuine smiles right from the entrance of the hotel ,the  security  guards ,the bellboy, the front desk officers ,the waiters and waitresses, the chef or the cleaners , they  will never missed to greet you . On night ,we returned to the hotel late and the waitress who had started work as early as 6a.m. was still at work ,she saw us and greeted us with a smile  " selamat malam bu" ,which is "good evening madam "in Eng. The front desk officers could  recognise us even we had met just once . The unexpected room service for the day of our departure was a real surprise to us. They made sure we had our breakfast before we left for our flight . Though the hotel may rank 3 stars and  it has only a lift to share with every guests ,however the  services and the warm smiles mellow your heart. Serela Cihampelas is there to greet you !
title: A 3 stars hotel  that shines

text:
Stayed here for 3 nights in May with my mother and we enjoyed our stay very much. This hotel also provided us airport transfers and the driver was very punctual on both occasions - from and to the airport.

The front desk officers were very helpful and polite. As for the room, I booked the biggest one there was and so we were very happy in terms of space although two things bothered us a bit :

1. There is no proper cupboard - I understand that this may be some minimalist look the hotel was hoping to achieve but the open space provided to hang our clothes was too small- not enough for two people and the hangers were put waaaayy tooo high for your average Asian. It is a good thing that I am rather tall- my mum gave up trying to reach the hangers and ended up plonking her clothes on the floor, something I have NEVER seen my mother do in my entire ife - I helped hang her clothes but again, the space given is too small. may i suggest you re-fit your bigger rooms (Super Deluxe) with proper cupboards as I see there is plenty of space for one.

2. The curtains came off the hooks and this was not fixed. As we had a room facing Cihampelas street I was a bit uncomfortable changing and used my bag to ensure that the curtain would stay in place.

The wi-fi signal can be dodgy...so i hope you will work on this. As for breakfast, I too would like to suggest a better spread though I must say that the thoughtful gesture of calling guests who have yet to be in the coffeehouse for breakfast is much appreciated.

I will not hesitate to rank this hotel with a 5 star rating if these hiccups are looked into. Either way, I will most probably choose this hotel to stay in should I be in Bandung again! It is just too strategic to not want to stay in. I especially loved how close it is to Ciwalk Mall. This is easily the most strategic hotel in Bandung.
title: Most strategic Hotel in bandung

text: Located at good area for shopping and for F&B. The hotel is clean with very friendly staff.. Its convenient place to stay. Serela Cihampelas is our first choice hotel when we decided / plan our trip to Bandung.

text:
Stayed here for business purposes in Bandung area.

Location wise is the key for this hotel.
Its located in front of Cihampelas Walk, you can easily find anything there, in Cihampelas street.

The highlight for negative things when I stayed here:
1. Small parking lot!
2. The room so smelly, seriously this is the worst smell I ever stay at any hotels. I asked to move to another room, but in the new room also smell not good, same with the other room. It smells like your laundry still wet but you iron it, or like socks that you used whole day and doing exercise. Nahh! Seriously!!
3. WiFi not good at all!!
4. For local handphone provider, it can not work at this hotel, you need to go to the lobby first to get the signal!

Positive points from my stay:
1. Yess, location.
2. Friendly staffs
That's it!

Room ok, not that big but ok, quite enough for the cleanliness. 
Bathroom also ok, no complaint.

For next visit to Bandung, I will consider another hotel to stay, won't be back to this hotel again!
title: Location wise, that's it!

text: A very simple words to describe about this hotel. Super great of everything that will make you wanna return back again and again. Just a few steps away from Ciwalk Mall at Cihampelas road. Services from all staff was super duper funtastic with fabulous smiles on their face. Very helpful. Not to worry bout getting foods and drinks as theres hundreds food stalls and restaurant to feed your hungry stomach 24/7. Cool weather. Friendly peoples. Easy to get a public transportation e.g: taxi...angkutan kota(Mini Vans). Nearby factory outlet.  You gonna missed this hotel once you checkout. Trust me, you gonna lovin it. I have no issue with this great hotel, it just a small matter with a low water pressure for shower, plus a water temperature is quite hotter than usual especially during nite time which is its difficult to get a shower with such quite hot water. Dont wait...Get your best rates by directly booked your room from this hotel website.

text: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Having booked this hotel online from Malaysia, I was expecting a budget standard for a budget price. But I was pleasantly shocked to find that the room is airconditioned and exceedingly clean with comfortable beds and flat-screen TV. It is located conveniently across an up-market shopping mall though I was more keen to go local. The staff at the counter was magnificently helpful. So was the concierge. There was nothing fake about their greetings and pleasantries. We were allowed to print out our boarding tickets without charge. small gestures like this goes a long way in making the stay thoroughly enjoyable.  I had just stayed at a 5-star hotel in Kuala Lumpur the week before and I would match my satisfaction with this hotel with the KL hotel! Well done to the hotel!
title: High standard accommodation at competitive rates

text:
I stay recently in Serela Cihampelas Hotel for my weekend break. I've been here for 3nights, it was super late check in. I was welcoming by the nice and friendly front office staff and friendly security. The room was great, clean and ready to go when I was check in there ( I stay in #503)

Only 2 things dislike: limited breakfast menu selection and limited parking space :( 
From this 2 things,

Apart for that,I love this hotel. Good service, awesome staff (they such a friendly person, helpful and really pay attention to guest need, which is really really good), location was excellent, walking distance to Cihampelas Walk and close by to public facilities such as atm, mini market even the stall and shop :), bed was so comfortable (I had a good sleep there), all are working good in the room also Internet connection was good and stable (which is it's really important for me, so I will be able for working from my room) and don't forget to try 1hour massage in Tasha Spa, I did try their spa treatment and it was good, great therapist as well.

For me, Serela Cihampelas Hotel is good and very recommended for stay when you are in Bandung :) I'm definitely will be back again.

Thank you Serela Cihampelas Hotel!
title: Definitely will be back again :)

text: My family of 5 stayed here 3 nights in September. We took 2 superior rooms which was comfortably large (with free wifi) and shower. The room also comes with coffee/tea facility but without mini fridge. Breakfast was simple with Indonesian menu, bread and fruits. What I like about this hotel is the location. It it nestled in the perfect location i.e at the famous Cihampelas shopping street and across the Cihampelas Walk Mall (Ciwalk) where you are spoilt for choice be it food or shopping. Throughout our stay the staff was courteous and friendly, asking us if we experience any sort of discomfort and offered advice how to go about in Bandung. On our last day, the Duty Manager voluntarily checked if the hotel's vehicle was available and offered to send us to the airport free of charge. We visit Bandung often and Serela Cihampelas was the first hotel to offer such kind gesture. Will definitely stay here again during future visits.
title: enjoyable stay at shopping street

title: Good location

text:
If you’re about to book this hotel, PLEASE read and consider based on my experience.
-They don’t have basement, absolute hassle when you travel with cars. The parking area fits less than 20 cars approximately.
- During check in, they mentioned that there is IDR 100.000 deposit for the room keys. The card seems like it has been used for 1000 years already, full of scratch and was torn here and there.
- Prior entering the room, you can hear all people’s conversation from all the rooms in the alley.
- The pictures they showed on the website or platform are COMPLETELY different with the reality. I would say it is nearly a scam. 
- The room smells really, REALLY bad. It’s like a humid abandoned room.
- All the room amenities are very old and used for a long time, even the tissue box is not proper for use even in your own house anymore. Tables are scratched and washroom is absolute disaster. Water stains are still on the metals and I don’t even mind skipping the shower because how bad it was, too scared to use the towels also. 
- The bed is super terrible, blood stains and other mysterious stains on the sheets and duvets. I found hairs on the linen folds and felt very ITCHY here and there when I lay down. 
- They don’t even care to vacuum the carpet at all. It’s all dusty and was badly torn and stained. 

Had to ask for rooms change because I can’t even stand for 5 mins inside. They changed it with quite similar rooms, only the ac is colder. My room had no key card access so they gave me ancient manual key. The guy mentioned that the smell in the room is because there’s no window so no proper circulation (absolute ridiculous excuse, you’re not the only hotel without open windows). Still the smell, stains, and dirty washroom in the new rooms but we had no choice. 
Staying in so many hotels, it is the worst I have ever been. I don’t blame the staff at all, seems like the owner did not even care to refurbish the hotel into a proper one.

Location wise, it’s a good walking distance with souvenir stores and Ciwalk, but please, safe yourself and book better ones like Fave or Amaris with a cheaper price (if not same) with completely different quality. 

Very less people reviewed on Trip Advisor but if you see booking.com, so many people reviewed and mention the same exact points with me. Will copy this and put there as well once I check out first thing in the dawn. 
Will never stay in this hotel anymore even for an hour, even if they give it for free.

I have pictures of all the things I mentioned above. Just for the proof of this terrible stay.
title: Absolute Disaster

text:
I've been traveling a lot and of course, stay at so many hotels around the globe. And every time I come to Bandung, I stay at different hotels. This time I have tried to stay at Serela Cihampelas Hotel which was nearby the shopping center (Ciwalk), just walking distance. I give some feedback:

1. We booked two rooms with Agoda. Supposed to stay on July 17-19. However, we had a sudden event in Jakarta and should have changed the date of the 23-25, July. I called the reservation and they said it was not possible to change as I had to call Agoda directly. Fortunately, I knew exactly about the hotel's procedure so forth. And I tried to call the Front Office Manager "Arief Rahman" at Serela Hotel (Jl. Riau) as I thought its one group under (Kagum), hoping he could have helped us. Arief explained that though the same name "Serela" but the different procedure. Weird. In 5 minutes later, Arief texted me that they had changed our arrival date as we wished and without paying any additional charges!!! Wow!!! That's excellent! Outstanding service that Arief has given to us. He knows exactly how to exceed customer satisfaction. Thank you, Pa Arief, keep up the great work!!! I hope all the Front Liners in Bandung to be like him.

2. Good location, very easy to find the restaurants due to Covid-19, most of them close at 08:00 PM

3. Limited parking lot, however, it would be easy to get our car as the Concierge staffs were professional. They worked quickly and carefully. Two thumbs up!!!

4. All the Front Office staffs and Housekeeping were friendly, always greet us with a smile.

The flaws :

1. In the elevator. Due to the health protocol, supposed to be for 4-5 people, not 6 people especially when the size was only 1,5 x 1,5 M. Physical distancing needs to be applied here.

2. Suggest using a face mask for the HK staff as they meet the guests.

The rest are all fine. Keep up the great work. We'll come back to Bandung again in Aug.
title: 3 Star Hotel with 5 Star Hotel Services

text:
I’ve been stayed at Serela Hotel in another branch. So i have the same expectation for this one. But i would rather not to stay here anymore.
1. When i asked for rooms upgrade, they needed more than 5 minutes to ensure that i can upgrade. Untill i decided to wait in my room.
2. After i got the new room, in the night someone try to open my door. Fortunately i was awake so i could prevent him to enter. I said to him maybe he got the wrong room but the fact was the receptionist give the same room as mine. Hello, dont they have application to track the room whic one is occupied and which one is not?
3. For the first two days in the lobby was smell like a garbage can. It was really annoying for a hotel. Two days is a long day for a business like a hotel
4. There were stains in my bed
5. The food was not really good too
The only good thing abou this hotel was only the strategic location. In front of the Cihampelas Walk (many food serves here). But it is also one of the center of the jamp.

text: Just like common hotel. Location is good very close with shoping centre but room condition is bad. small room, dirty, bed sheet was smell. with high price, its not recommended to people who want to sleep in comfortable condition.

text: I deal with the staff name Giant.i can deal anything with him thru WhatsApp when im travel around Bandung before i back to the hotel. The hotel is very near to busy street with lots of shoplots selling food.....it's very convenience to stay. The only problem is water in low pressure.
title: Friendly staff & nice hotel

text: I had a short trip to Bandung recently and booked a room over here. Hotel is near to shop lots and a shopping mall. So no issue over last minute shopping. Breakfast is also provided. The room was clean, staffs were really friendly and helpful. Paulina did a great job assisting us when we first got there. To conclude my review, I had a good time and was satisfied with the service.
title: Good time in Bandung!

text: Booked 2 rooms at this hotel as I was looking for a hotel closed to Ciwalk for one event and it was perfect. People were very nice. Breakfast also ok. Kagum group has many hotels and I have stayed a few of them and noticed that after a few years after the hotels opened,  the room cleanliness seems need to be put in their attention. 2 rooms had different lighting - one was very dimmed. Free valet parking available.

text: Location is very close to Cihampelas Street/Mall. Good for finding food when you don't want to go far as Cihampelas Walk has a lot of food options. But cause of the location, some jam to be expected. And breakfast is average. Though room is clean.

text: Touch down at Jakarta airport from KL straight to Bandung by travel van. We stay at this hotel while we in Bandung. We are so surprise that hotel location exactly in front of Chi walk mall dan others attractive Shop. Easy access to anywhere by local transportation or by grab application. Hotel room also nice and modern room. Clean room and very wonderful and cheerful staff.Very helpful with any questions and enquiry. Will stay here again for our next visit.
title: We enjoying our holidays

text: this hotel is strategically positioned on the edge of cihampelas main road and 20 meters from the ciwalk shopping center and in front of the hotel there is access to the cihampelas terrace.for standard room sizes and in accordance with the price, for a nice and complete breakfast..the lack of a small parking area.
title: good place

text: My stay was pleasant because I put some notes on my booking and the staffs really accomplished all my requests. They get the job done! Once i arrive they already prepare all the keys with side by side rooms and it didn't take longer than 5 mins. I'm amaze (since its never happened to me especially in Indonesia's Hotels). I asked for Cold AC temperature and when i enter the room they specially turn it on before we arrive so the room was cold and nice. Oh my.. what a really good service!! The beds are comfortable and Wifi works well. The breakfast was quite good and again the staffs were very helpful and nice. So I wanna say Thank You to all the staffs here, You are amazing. Location is very good for first timer to visit Bandung. Few things that need improvement are the cleanliness of the bathroom, small parking space, and no Swimming Pool. Other than that, everything was perfect. Would love to come back again.
title: Great Service and Stay!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed here for short getaway for 3 nights.
This hotel resides in one of the most trafficked place in entire Bandung. The famous cihampelas street.
Location was very good. Just across ci-walk, great outdoor concept mall. Love the design of the mall.
I usually use taxi that stand by at the mall to get around town rather than waiting for grab or uber because waiting time will be very long.
Great food around hotels as i tried kambing bakar kairo (very good), and iga bakar pak Jangkung in the other road.
There is cheap laundry (not so) near hotel that located on jardin apartment.

The hotel at first feel okay. Lobby was very clean. As I enter the room it feels clean enough until i find several problem. Carpet was stained, bed sheets was stained too (but not much) although the bed itself was good, and major problems in bathroom.
The Hot water cannot be mixed with cold water, it stays hot on both side of the tap.
And when my friends complain about this, the water turns cold, and stays cold. 
I waited for 1 hour to get this fixed.

And then the sink was leaked, we call technician too and got that fixed too.
Wifi was virtually unuseable, so slow i can't work.
And last problem, breakfast was disaster. Try everything on the menu but the taste was so bad, even simple coffee was very bad.

However, there was a very positive things about the staff. All were attentive, quickly responded to my complaint, and professional. I was upgraded from basic room to deluxe (i guess). 

Kudos to the staff and i hope the hotel can see my review and get all of the problems occurred to be fixed
title: Kind of Mixed Feelings

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Serela Cihampelas Hotel is located in the busy Cihampelas Street, just accross the famous Cihampelas Walk shopping compound. It took 20 minutes to get there from the Husein Satranegara Airport by local taxi, or 15 minutes from the Bandung train station. Nearby there were plenty of choices to eat. If you have some businesses related with Bandung Institute of Technology (ITB), the campus can be reach within 15 minutes of walk and about 10 minutes using local transportation called "Angkot" which cost you IDR 4,000. You may also choose to order taxi from the hotel concierge, ask Gemah Ripah taxi, it cost you around IDR 25,000. 
The hotel itself is a basic BnB, standard room with limited amenity, great hospitality, average breakfast. I stayed here for nearly a week during my business trip to ITB. 
Most of the time here I spent exploring eateries at Ciwalk, Cihampelas and Cipaganti. Worth to try.
title: Good hotel near ITB

text:
We book total 15 rooms in Serela Cihampelas Hotel and stayed for 4D3N and really want to say thank to RSVN staff Fitri for her efficient in arrangment of the room base on our request. Upon arrival to the hotel the reception was courteous and welcoming .. Okky n Pratiwi is really friendly and patient with all my Q&A. 
However there few area that need an improvement 

Minus point : 
* Bathroom has unpleasant smell 
* Few room have mouldy smell 
* Some Pillowcase are smelly & some are dirty (notink was done even after we inform the reception)
* Few Bedsheet have stain ( notink was done even after we inform the reception )  
* Bath Towels condition can be improved.
* No proper Closet, only provided 3 hangers and it is way to high. ( cant use if you are short )  

Positif Point 
- Room have safe box 
- Big wall tv and more then 15 tv chanel
- Room is clean
- Big bathroom 
- Wifi was ok 
- Room service is 24hr and the food is SUPERB.
- Good Breakfast area, but the food are so so. 
-   Hotel next to Ciwalk mall, crazy local delicacies at a mouthwatering prices.

The Team was really pleased with the attitude of the front desk & restaurant personnel !! 
Keep up that great attitude. Starting to Miss Bandung !!
title: Great Location & Service

text:
Despite having some hiccups with the first room I checked into, Okky (the duty manager) wasted no time in rectifying the problem. He came right up to my room to address the problem personally and made sure I was all fine and settled. Every staff I came in contact with here in serela are welcoming and kind, including Okky who is an added GEM to the hotel. He is very passionate and sincere about his job and service. I would like to commend on his outstanding service.

The grand deluxe room is spacious and clean enough, and hotel location is directly opposite the mall which makes it extremely convenient to stay at.
title: Top notch service

Its a surprising to me that hotel pick up is a Free shuttle for their service and upon arrival, Pamela@Reception staff who check in for me at earlier morning at 9am with room ready given to me.Its a good arrangement and i hv not see any hotel just built up within 1 month and still Pre - opening with 80 rooms, Reception staff and coffee house staff and limo staff who  can deliver me a 5 star service. Room with comfortable king koil brand bed and pillow was amazing and sleep well after tired from shopping.A good location and by walk 5 minutes to Cihampelas walk.I would like to give my best compliments to Yusita@Manager@.Well done. i.would return again your hotel with my family next year 2015.

text: ホテルの目の前には服の問屋街があります。とても安いので買い物をするのには便利です。バンドン駅から１５分程です。
title: 買い物に便利

text:
バンドンで最大のモール、チハンプラスウォークまで数分の便利な場所にあります。ホテルは規模は小さめですが新しくきれいで、部屋は広くはないものの機能的にまとまっています。受付のスタッフがフレンドリーで好印象でした。
欠点は、部屋にスリッパがなかったのと、wifiがすぐに切断されてネット接続が非常に不便だったことです。
title: 便利なロケーションのホテル

text:
ทำเลค่อนข้างดีอยู่บนถนน Cihampelas ซึ่ง(เขาว่ากันว่า)เป็นแหล่งขายเสื้อผ้า และกางเกงยีนส์ราคาถูกค่ะ Serela ตั้งอยู่ตรงข้ามกับห้าง Cihampelas walk พอดี หาอะไรกินง่ายดี

- ห้องไม่ใหญ่(เทียบกับราคาแล้วก็โอเคนะ) แต่ยังใหม่และสะอาด 
- ไม่มีตู้เสื้อผ้า แต่มีราวแขวนอยู่เหนือโต๊ะ 
- มีชา กาแฟ กาน้ำร้อน และน้ำสองขวด, ผ้าเช็ดตัว, อุปกรณ์อาบน้ำให้ตาม standard โรงแรม
- มีทีวี ,เซฟ, ไดร์เป่าผม
- ห้องน้ำเป็นฝักบัวไม่มีอ่างอาบน้ำ

- รู้สึกห้องมืดไปหน่อย
- พบปัญหาตอน check-in ตอนที่จองผ่าน web hotel.com แสดงว่ารวมอาหารเช้า แต่ว่าไปถึงพนักงานแจ้งว่าไม่รวมอาหารเช้า
title: ทำเลดี ห้องสมราคา

photos.caption: ส่วนอาบน้ำ
ที่แขวนเสื้อผ้า

text:
Avons passe 2 nuits a l'hotel Serela. L'Hotel se situe juste en face du Centre commercial Ciwalk et dans une rue commercante parfaite pour s'acheter des habits. Le tarif tres interessant en raison du tarif de lancement dont nous avons beneficie.
L'Hotel est propre et moderne. Le personnel tres aimable et professionnel. Le WIFI nous a donne quelques soucis de par sa lenteur.
title: Good location in Bandung
